pages.text: 38|62|Kare-ra (hi goku no nakama) wa iu. `Watashi-tachi ga akunin no naka ni kazoete ita hitobito ga mienai nodesu. Do shita nodeshou.
38|63|Watashi-tachi ga chosho shite ita mono (ga mienai). Kare-ra wa,(watashi-tachi no)-me o kurama seta node wanaideshou ka.'
38|64|Hontoni kore wa shinso de, hi goku no nakama no ronsodearu.
38|65|Gen tte yaru ga i. `Watashi wa keikoku-sha ni suginai. Yuiitsu no kata, teiko dekinai kata, arra no soto ni wa kami wa nai nodearu.
38|66|Ten to ji, soshite sonoaida no ban'yu no shu, iryoku narabinaku kan'yode ara reru.'
38|67|Itte yaru ga i. `Kore wa shiko no shirasedearu.
38|68|Anata gata wa, sorekara somuki saruga.
38|69|Katsute (tenshi no) takai ikai no mono-tachi no rongi ni tsuite wa, watashi wa nani no chishiki mo nakatta.
38|70|Kore ga watashi ni keiji sa reta no wa, tada watashi ga Komei ni keikoku suru tamedearu.'
38|71|Anata no omo ga, tenshi-tachi ni,`ware wa doro kara ningen o tsukurou to shite iru.' To ose rareta toki o omoe.
38|72|`Sorede ware ga, kare (ningen) o katachidzukuri, soreni rei o fukikondanaraba, anata gata wa fuku shite kare ni sajida shi nasai.'
38|73|Sokode tenshi-tachi wa, kai isseini sajida shitaga,
38|74|iburisu dake wa so shinakatta. Kare wa koman de, shinko o kobamu mono to natta.
38|75|Kare wa ose rareta. `Iburisu yo, ware no tezukara tsukutta mono ni sajida suru no ni, nani ga anata o samatageta no ka. Anata wa koman'na no ka, soretomo takai (iryoku aru)-shana no ka.'
38|76|Kare wa moshiageta. `Watashi wa kare (ningen) yori mo sugurete imasu, anata wa hi de watashi o o tsukuri ni narimashitaga, kare wa doro de tsukura reta dakedesu.'
38|77|Kare wa ose rareta. `Sorenara anata wa, koko kara dete iki nasai, hontoni imawashikara.
38|78|Soshite ware kara no mikagiri wa, shinpan no hi made kanarazu anata no ue ni arou.'
38|79|Kare wa moshiageta. `Omo yo, kare-ra ga yobiokosa reru hi made, yuyo o negaimasu.'
38|80|Kare wa ose rareta. `Anata o yuyo shiyou.
38|81|Sadame rareta nichiji made.'
38|82|Kare wa moshiageta. `Soredewa, anata no o iko ni kakete chikaimasu. Watashi wa kare-ra (ningen) subete no mono o yuwaku shimasu.
38|83|Kare-ra no naka no, anata no kenkyona shimo be o nozoite wa.'
